response.overview: When Aria was 13 her mom forced her to leave town and her dad behind with no notice to anyone. To this day, Aria doesn't know why. When she turns 16 and gets a car, she returns to her hometown to talk to her dad and to find out why. Before meeting with her him, she meets with her childhood best friend and reflects on her past, and her life before she left.
response.title: Crossroads
